issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Exception:
com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.

When spinning up a new instance the instance sits in the pending state indefinitely. Checking services the CC will have been put in NOT READY state.  Doing a cc restart may bring it back, sometimes it takes a cleanrestart and other times it must be stopped then started to bring it back. I don't have more precise steps to reproduce at the moment.

fields.summary: CC can go to NOT READY state when spinning up instances

comments.body: Tony, could you attempt to reproduce this issue?  We believe it may have been addressed by other changes

I have been unable to reproduce this with a current build:
Version     : 3.2.0
Release     : 0.0.317.20121108git1a1ce465.el6

Spun up and terminated instances many many times
